snippet: The 10-minute movies will include new material shot on location in areas like Denmark and Egypt as part of Shakespeare’s Globe’s commemoration of the 400th anniversary of the playwright’s death.
abstract: The 10-minute movies will include new material shot on location in areas like Denmark and Egypt as part of Shakespeare’s Globe’s commemoration of the 400th anniversary of the playwright’s death.

headline.main: Short Films to Celebrate Shakespeare’s Plays
headline.print_headline: Short Films to Celebrate Shakespeare’s Plays
